short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MailChecker for Outlook™ enables you to receive, reply to emails and get new email notifications, within the user interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send, receive and reply emails, get new email notifications and redirect to OWA without opening a new tab.

The Microsoft Outlook™ browser extension brings you the power of mail using an icon in the browser. You can quickly access your Outlook work, school or personal account or your Outlook.com or Hotmail account without switching to another tab or app.

Please report bugs and suggest improvements to the SUPPORT HUB below.

Features
- Access work, school or personal accounts of Outlook.com or Hotmail.com
- Read, send, and manage email and get new email notifications  
- Switch between "Light" and "Dark" mode
- Increase/Decrease email density
- Use "Do not disturb" feature
- Bulk delete or archive emails
- Open your mailfolders and switch between them 
- Deleting or setting email as read through notification pop-up
- Redirect to OWA by clicking on icon
- Extensive FAQs and personal tech support with very quick responses


Great for doing all this without switching tabs

MailChecker for Outlook™ changelog:

Dec v. 1.1.10
   - Improved error handling
Dec v. 1.1.9
   - Implement infinite scroll
